ValidationRule.description: User with Level 3 and above can only be chosen as Approver
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: If(AND( Name__c !=null, OR( ISPICKVAL( BusinessRole__c ,'Program Approver') , ISPICKVAL( BusinessRole__c ,'Fiscal Approver') ) , VALUE( Text(Name__r.Level__c ))< VALUE( $Setup.GNT__GlobalConfig__c.MinimumApprovalLevel__c ) ),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Assigned users for the approval role do not have organizational approval authority (level). Please pick a different user or contact your administrator.
